7F9EF449A760D102.title: Never mind, it's not as bad as I thought.

display.title: Oh no! Pure dust?!
description: A side product of sifting is the production of &&dpure dusts&&r. These shouldn't be sent back to your main storage, because they can't be used in recipes... and &&3centrifuging&&r them will give you a sweet, sweet extra byproduct.

subtitle.text: Fear not! We have our solution!
